short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drop in Akita for instant API observability

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you run Akita on website traffic to automatically generate an OpenAPI v3 specification.

This tool is for Akita beta users who want to try out Akita's ability to automatically generate API specs, before deploying Akita in staging or production for continuous API modeling and per-endpoint API monitoring. Sign up for our beta here: https://www.akitasoftware.com/beta-signup.
